title: July 4
description:
Happy birthday, America!

What sort of present do you get a country that has everything from purple mountains majesty to rolling hills of grain?

How about a soccer team that makes it to the World Cup finals?

Well, maybe in 2014 for your 234th birthday!

And check out this video of Milo's mad hula hoop skillz!

children.title: Beale St. Cafe
children.description:
Beale Street Cafe is the nearest establishment to Dean's office showing every single game of the World Cup.

Dean's not watching ALL the games -- not even half -- but he's had some good times cheering for the US here.

He's also worn his French jersey here twice. And twice had to slink out after the match... football-wise, Dean picked a poor year to become French.

children.title: USA B-Day
children.description: What the heck are we eating corn on the cob outdoors at dusk for?

children.title: Fireworks
children.description:
The 4th of July marks the day the fog rolls into the bay for the summer.

This picture doesn't show it, but the higher fireworks got lost in the fog.

Everybody sung Happy Birthday to America and had a grand old time. We biked there and Milo slept in the trailer on the way back. Felix made it without problem.

children.title: L'Invitation
children.description:
Now that the entire family is French, we apparently pull some weight at the French consulate.

We got an invitation to the consulate's Bastille Day party on July 14th!
